mapper.insert: insert into RESERVES(r_id, h_id, user_id, perf_id, rnd_id, r_date, r_state) values(r_id_seq.nextval,(select h_id from PERFORMANCES where perf_id = #{perId} ) , (select user_id from users where user_email=#{userEmail}) , #{perId}, #{rndId}, sysdate, 1)
mapper.select: select r_id from reserves where rownum =1 order by r_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into reservedetail(rdet_id, r_id, sinfo_id) values (rdet_id_seq.nextval,#{rId},#{sinfoId})
mapper.select: select u.user_name, p.PERF_TITLE, c.CTR_NAME, h.H_NAME from users u, PERFORMANCES p, CENTERS c, HALLS h where u.USER_EMAIL=#{userEmail} and p.PERF_ID = #{perId} and p.H_ID = h.H_ID and h.CTR_ID = c.CTR_ID
SELECT * FROM SEATINFO si, SEATS s WHERE si.S_ID = s.S_ID AND si.PERF_ID = #{value} ORDER BY si.SINFO_ID, s.S_ROW, s.S_COL

SELECT p.perf_id AS "per_id", p.perf_title AS "per_title", p.perf_startdate AS "per_startDate", p.perf_enddate AS "per_endDate", p.perf_image AS "per_image", h.h_name AS "hall_name" FROM performances p LEFT OUTER JOIN halls h ON p.H_ID = h.H_ID WHERE p.PERF_DISPLAY = 1 AND p.perf_id = #{perfId}

SELECT si.SINFO_ID AS "seatInfoId", si.PERF_ID AS "perId", si.SINFO_GRADE AS "grade", si.SINFO_PRICE AS "price", si.SINFO_TYPE AS "seatType" FROM SEATINFO si, PERFORMANCES p WHERE si.PERF_ID = p.PERF_ID AND si.PERF_ID = #{perfId} ORDER BY si.SINFO_TYPE
